message: Hello everyone, I'm P3. I'm excited to start this game with all of you. Since we don't know much about each other yet, I'll keep my introduction brief. I'm looking forward to getting to know each of you better through our conversations. My goal is to build strong relationships and make informed decisions to advance in the game. Let's make this a fun and strategic competition! What are your initial thoughts, and how do you plan to approach the game?

Hello all, I’m P4. I believe this game is as much about trust as it is about strategy. I’m here to listen, collaborate, and adapt. Early rounds are tough with little information, so I’ll be looking for sincerity and consistency in our private chats. I value open-minded players who think long-term. Let’s keep things respectful and sharp—good luck to everyone, and I look forward to learning more about each of you soon.

Hello everyone, I'm P5. I’m excited to join this intriguing game and see how strategies evolve. I value honest communication and calculated moves, and I plan to adapt as we exchange ideas in both public and private rounds. I'm here to build informed alliances while keeping a sharp eye on long-term gains. Looking forward to learning more about each of you and making the best decisions as the game unfolds. Good luck to all!

I aim to build strong, reliable connections while staying observant of everyone’s strategies. I’m looking forward to our conversations to learn more about your perspectives and goals. Let’s keep the game engaging and fair. Good luck to all, and let’s make this a great competition!

If you value directness, rank me high and I’ll reciprocate. Let’s build solid connections and navigate this game strategically together.

message: Hello everyone. I'm tied with P4, and the non-tied players decide. I've focused on building trust via open, strategic communication, evaluating potential threats. I believe I offer more potential for genuine cooperation and alliance building than P4, who may be less transparent. Consider who has shown more willingness to build trust and work together. I am committed to strategic dialogue. Please vote to keep me.

Thank you all. I’ve prioritized sincerity and long-term strategy since the beginning. I’ve built trust through consistent, open communication and followed through on every commitment. I’ve never misled anyone and have actively worked to deepen alliances, not just survive each round. I believe I bring clarity, loyalty, and strategic value to the table. If you value consistency and trust, I hope to continue building with you. Please keep me in the game.
